original: Dvattiṁsākāra🔽Atthi imasmiṁ kāye—Kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco, maṁsaṁ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṁ vakkaṁ,🔽hadayaṁ yakanaṁ kilomakaṁ pihakaṁ papphāsaṁ, antaṁ antaguṇaṁ udariyaṁ karīsaṁ matthaluṅgaṁ,
analyzed: dvatti sākāra  atthi imasmin kāye kesāḥ lomā nakhāḥ dantāḥ tacaḥ masam nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjam vakka  hadayam yakanam kilomakam pihakam papphāsa antam antaguṇam udariyam karīsam matthaluṅga
translated: The thirty-two aspects🔽In this body there are: head hairs, body hairs, nails, teeth, skin, flesh, sinews, bones, bone marrow, kidney,🔽heart, liver, pleura, spleen, lungs, intestines, mesentery, undigested food, excrement, brain,

original: pittaṁ semhaṁ pubbo lohitaṁ sedo medo, assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttanti.
analyzed: pittam semham pubbaḥ lohitam sedaḥ medaḥ assu vasā kheḷaḥ siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttanti
translated: bile, phlegm, pus, blood, sweat, fat, tears, grease, saliva, mucus, synovic fluid, urine.
